headline: Emerald Bay Risk Solutions Strengthens Leadership Team
summary: MORRISTOWN, N.J., August 21, 2025--Emerald Bay Risk Solutions ("Emerald Bay" or the "Company"), a collaborative underwriting carrier, today announced the expansion of its leadership team with the appointments of Matthew Moore as Chief Financial Officer and Sarah Anyieth as Chief Operating Officer, effective immediately.

raw.headline: Emerald Bay Risk Solutions Strengthens Leadership Team
raw.summary: MORRISTOWN, N.J., August 21, 2025--Emerald Bay Risk Solutions ("Emerald Bay" or the "Company"), a collaborative underwriting carrier, today announced the expansion of its leadership team with the appointments of Matthew Moore as Chief Financial Officer and Sarah Anyieth as Chief Operating Officer, effective immediately.
